Chicago Code Camp 2

January 2010 · wordpress, republished, wayback, uncategorized

Originally published on WordPress on January 16, 2010. View original article.

Archive note: Originally published on just3ws.wordpress.com. Republished from local Wayback snapshot exports.

The planning has begun for the second annual Chicago Code Camp. To put it in software development terms, we’re still in the “early alpha pre-release” phase. As soon as we have concrete information available I’ll post more details. In the meantime this is all I can say about the event.

- It’s going to be in Chicago, or at least very close. Definitely in Illinois
- it will be a software developer oriented event.
- the speakers will be real software developers. Not cardboard cutouts.
- there will be a website within the next few weeks.
- start thinking about a talk you’d like to give.
- this event will be *the awesome*

stay tuned for more info.
